text: Justin and the Knights of Valour is a 2013 Spanish computer animated comic epic movie produced by Kandor Graphics for Entertainment One Films. It stars Freddie Highmore, Saoirse Ronan, James Cosmo, Charles Dance, Tamsin Egerton, Antonio Banderas, Rupert Everett, Alfred Molina, Mark Strong, Angela Lansbury, David Walliams, Julie Walters and Olivia Williams. It was released on 13 September 2013. == Cast == * Freddie Highmore as Justin, A young dragon trainer, Justin became a superhero in the world of dragon training after a series of trials and training. * Saoirse Ronan as Talia * James Cosmo as Blucher * Charles Dance as Legantir * Tamsin Egerton as Lara * Antonio Banderas as Sir Clorex * Rupert Everett as Sota * Barry Humphries as Braulio * Alfred Molina as Reginald * Mark Strong as Heraclio * Angela Lansbury as The Witch * David Walliams as Melquiades * Julie Walters as Grandma Lilly * Olivia Williams as The Queen == Release Dates == Country Premiere 12 September 2013 13 September 2013 19 September 2013 20 September 2013 21 September 2013 (Film by the Sea Film Festival) 26 September 2013 2 October 2013 4 October 2013 24 October 2013 14 November 2013 15 November 2013 21 November 2013 22 November 2013 26 November 2013 26 November 2013 (German speaking region) 28 November 2013 (DVD premiere) 28 November 2013 11 December 2013 12 December 2013 13 December 2013 19 December 2013 20 December 2013 31 December 2013 9 January 2014 23 January 2014 24 January 2014 30 January 2014 13 March 2014 28 March 2014 12 June 2014 22 July 2014 (DVD premiere) 31 July 2014 15 August 2014 18 September 2014 26 November 2014 (DVD premiere) 9 January 2015 (DVD premiere) 5 April 2016 (DVD premiere) ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:Spanish adventure movies Category:Spanish fantasy movies Category:Dutch movies Category:2013 adventure movies Category:2013 fantasy movies Category:2013 computer-animated movies Category:2010s English-language movies
title: Justin and the Knights of Valour
